https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c7WZbQOwAOwVohDhIOgcMxz02hA.jpg At his best friend's New Year's Eve party, Gary desperately tries to spark the interest of Ann, his ex-girlfriend, without letting his friends embarrass him, but ends up receiving devastating news instead. Better Days
